overview: Yudi Emmanuel is an IT distributor and consultant. He obtained his first degree in 1993 from the Federal University of Portharcourt Rivers state and obtained Post graduate diploma in Business Management from the same stated university. he worked in Prime technologies in Victoria Island Lagos Nigeria as Marketing officer and proceeded to SAAP Technologies and also a brief stay with Kibe Internationals as IT manager. Presently the CEO of Dixon Consultant a leading IT distributor in Cote d’Ivoire.

degrees.subject: Sociology
degrees.institution: Federal University of Port Harcourt Rivers State Nigeria
